title: The Warriors Blew a 31-Point Lead | The Mismatch
description:
The resilient Los Angeles Clippers make a historic comeback against the reigning champion Golden State Warriors in Game 2 (0:42) and the Philadelphia 76ers redeem themselves with a resounding win against the Brooklyn Nets (26:44).
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor
